titleStmt.title: List of research software mentioned in ADHO conference abstracts

item.name: Python
item.note: Python Programming Language

item.name: Java
item.note: Java Programming Language

item.name: React
item.note: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

item.name: Pandas
item.note: Python Data Analysis Library

item.name: Matplotlib
item.note: Visualization with Python

item.name: Jupyter Notebook
item.note: a web application for creating and sharing computational documents

item.name: MediaWiki
item.note: a collaboration and documentation platform

item.name: PoetryLab
item.note: an extensible open source toolkit for syllabification, scansion (extraction of stress patterns), enjambment detection (syntactical units split in two lines), rhyme detection, and historical named entity recognition for Spanish poetry

item.name: spaCy
item.note: Industrial Strength Natural Language Processing in Python

item.name: Rantanplan
item.note: Scansion tool for Spanish texts in Python

item.name: JollyJumper
item.note: Enjambment detection Python library for Spanish

item.name: ANNIS
item.note: A web browser-based search and visualization architecture for complex multilayer linguistic corpora with diverse types of annotation.

item.name: IncipitSearch
item.note: A webservice for aggregating and searching notated music incipits.

item.name: ZeuScansion
item.note: ZeuScansion is a fst-based system capable of performing metrical scansion of poetry written in English.

item.name: the Scandroid 1.1
item.note: The Scandroid is a program that scans English verse in iambic and anapestic meters.
A metrical scansion system for fixed-metre Spanish poetry.
A Comparison of Feature-Based and Neural Scansion of Poetry
A Logic Programming Application for the Analysis of Spanish Verse

item.name: FreeLing
item.note: an open source language analysis tool suite

item.name: spacy-affixes
item.note: package which splits words with affixes before assigning PoS
La transcripcion fonetica automatica del diccionario electronico de formas simples flexivas del español: un estudio fonologico en el lexico.

item.name: HisMeTag
item.note: Hispanic Medieval Tagger (HisMeTag): una aplicación web para el etiquetado de entidades en textos medievales.

item.name: VOSviewer
item.note: a computer program for bibliometric mapping»
